mapper.sql: grid_id, grid_manager_id, evaluation_type, evaluation_date, evaluation_result, create_time, creator_id, modify_time
mapper.insert: insert into sc_grid_evaluation (grid_id, grid_manager_id, evaluation_type, evaluation_date, evaluation_result, create_time, creator_id, modify_time) values (#{gridId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gridManagerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{evaluationType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{evaluationDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{evaluationResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select grid_id, grid_manager_id, evaluation_type, evaluation_date, evaluation_result, create_time, creator_id, modify_time from sc_grid_evaluation
